reviews.text: Amazing place, great prices for the quantity of food you're receiving. They do take a while so I recommend calling for pickup before hand.

The food is delicious, well balanced sauces and good sized portions. I really like the General Tso's and the Fried Rice in particular, but the ribs and Chicken Broccoli are close in second place!
Highly suggest you try!

This is the best Chinese food in the Bronx. Their ingredients are always fresh, the lady at the counter is a badass, and the portion sizes are BIG!

I can't eat anywhere else, because other places don't even come close to Chen's Garden.
This is THE chinese food place to go to. One of the best in nyc. I'm not exaggerating. Has never dissapointed. The chef is 10/10 üëå Will keep coming here. My #1 go to
Got lunch here at 2:45. The beef and broccoli with pork fried rice and egg drop soup lunch special was just nice.  The Lunch special seems like a great deal to me. Come here again. üëç
Amazing food and good customer service
Bueno si y los chinotibetano buena honda y rapido
Everything was great nice and hot nice and fresh the way I like it
Great food always fresh and taste great
Used to be very good. Now the food is blah
It is now 12:56pm on a sunday. Why is the store not open?

It was wonderful to eat there and I hope anyone else who eats there feels the same way about this place. Even though I'm a little young I've eaten there my whole life . My family enjoys it as well even though I usually get the food.
Me encanto la comida de este restaurant, se ofrece un servicio rapido y muy econmico
